content:
RN Pudur also known as Ramanathapuram Pudur is a residential village located in Erode district in Tamil Nadu, India. It comes under the Suriyampalayam town panchayat, which is now a part of Integrated Erode Municipal Corporation.
RN Pudur is now defined by the industrial developments in the base of Textiles, Dyeing and Leather Processing. As a commercial suburb of Erode, a vast number of Tanneries and Dyeing Units are located around this area. The Armed Force and Police Quarters are located here.
